query: UPDATE products SET image = REPLACE(image, '.png', '.webp') WHERE image LIKE '%.png'
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user q8Ed9efAHcuZDzr.root --database iVAPtUQGMwL6qxGuVbNjoM --execute UPDATE products SET image = REPLACE(image, '.png', '.webp') WHERE image LIKE '%.png'
